summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York for Ghislaine Maxwell. It commands law enforcement to arrest her for charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple federal offenses related to the enticement and transportation of minors, as well as perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell in White Plains, NY.

events.title: Issuance of Arrest Warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. magistrate judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell on federal charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

keyFacts: An arrest warrant was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2019.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.
The charges listed include conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The case is filed in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.
The document is a standard federal arrest warrant form (Mod AO 442).
